channel.title: Shenanigans on Albert Azemars' Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Shenanigans on Albert Azemars' Blog

item.title: Planes Busses and Opera
item.description: Planes, busses, and opera Well, I’ve just landed at Bilbao Airport. I’m having a bit of a headache, probably caused by sleep deprivation or caffeine withdrawal. So ordering a double expresso seemed to be the obvious solution. Little did I know that I would be greeted with an overpriced coffee soup worthy to be served at Central Perk. To reach my final destination, Zarautz, I’m taking a bus that leaves in 30 minutes.

item.title: Hello World, Again!
item.description: So my blog is back. I started this project in March 2020 during the lockdown as a fun way to learn a bit about Django, python’s web app framework, and AWS (Amazon Web Services). I had some prior experience using Django from my first internship at NTT. If you are someone who has an interest in diving into this framework, I would strongly recommend CoreyMS 1 video series on YouTube about it.
